spec_data.Name: perl-Object-Remote
spec_data.Description:
Object::Remote allows you to create an object in another process - usually
one running on another machine you can connect to via ssh, although there
are other connection mechanisms available.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:38:00 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Call methods on objects in other processes or on other hosts
